extendedInfo.description: Get up to 70% more battery life for your Android devices! Powerful battery management features and easy interface with one touch controls will end your worry of dying battery!Du Battery Saver Pro version automates features from the Free version and adds up to 20% more battery life. Schedule power saving mode by power level or by time. Slow down CPU, remove power hogging apps and update device settings to boost your battery time.You deserve a prolonged battery! You can search & try our FREE version before purchase.âWE'RE PROUD TO RELEASE V3.0, A DRAMATIC UPGRADE YOU MUST CHECK OUT!â====Thank YOU! We're Moving on, with YOU! Android 4.2 SUPPORTED!=======Major New Features===1. Revolutionary UI design of Main page 2. Brand new reform of the Smart Widgets3. Whole redesign of the Settings page4. One tap optimization following battery saver analysis5. More manual optimization offered after analysis===Only for PRO===â Intelligent mode-switching: e.g. - adjusted to Long Standby on low battery level; - go into your preset mode according to your schedule;â Regularly closing power-draining tasks; - Set the interval of background tasks cleaning; - Need to leave some apps running background? Add them into ignore list.â Slow down CPU during screenlock; (ROOT devices only);===Classic features===â3 new powerful battery Widget s:   - One-tap optimizer (task killer widget)  - NEW designed battery display & mode switch  - premium ON/OFF switches;  It's an easy battery saver by using one-tap battery widget, and extend 15% more usage time by switching battery saving modes, also go with one-tap power widget. â Optimizing your battery use in 3 preset Modes:  - General Mode(Basic network function opened, meet normal battery saving needs); - Long Standby (Close all except dialing and SMS, prolong battery to the longest standby time); - Sleep Mode(Close all except clock, save battery a lot while sleeping);â Customize your own mode, setup whatever you prefer and find out the most suitable one! â Battery indicator, Battery Level in % in Status Bar, will turn to RED when < 20%;âEstimated report of the remaining time; âRingtone reminder for different battery status;  Always be a close secretary (or juice defender), reminding you to save more juice and have a 2x battery usage time.â Most detailed analysis of power consumption, not just apps, but also the hardwares (CPU, screen, sensor, WiFi, radio), the most professional battery monitor (battery notifier) so far;â One-Key diagnostic, a unbelievable foolproof way of battery saving.â Healthy charging to extend battery life. (e.g. hints for charging or de-plugging the charger). - launch Du Battery Saver to start charging when battery lower than 20%. - At least 1 healthy charge per month to extend battery life .â Unlike other battery saving app, Du Battery Saver provides a professional method of battery management by analyzing the power consumption of all the hardware modules, and above all, intelligent tools would be provided for extend battery usage. As a battery saver (a.k.a. battery booster / battery improver), it excels its peers!Please like us at: http://www.facebook.com/DuBatterySaveror follow us at: twitter.com/DXBatteryProblems? Contact us: dianxzt@gmail.comPlease send us email, not just leave comment, so that we can reach you for assistance.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Works great on my HTC DNA. I love it, one button optimization is very nice & custom modes are a great feature. Thanks!
reviews.author: Mike Stewart

reviews.title: Great battery optimization
reviews.comment: This app is the easiest and most effective and efficient way to get the most from your phones battery. Buy it!
reviews.author: Todd Koehler

reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for.  It simplifies having to go through the Android system settings to get the same effect if optimizing battery life. The saved configurations is a very practical idea to match individual phone usage. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Charles Smith

reviews.title: It\'s worth for what you paid for the pro version,
reviews.comment: So far so good, work well for my preferences.try different app, but finally likes this apps.
reviews.author: Attic Angelo

reviews.title: Definite improvement
reviews.comment: It definitely helps, though it\'s estimates of battery life left are way off, and when you optimize, most apps that are shut off just restart.
reviews.author: Jon H

reviews.title: Excellent app...
reviews.comment: My battery lasts fr ten hours now...before just three hours...keeps closing background running apps...kudos...worth..very little had to pay..
reviews.author: meena juneja

reviews.title: Superbe application - Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Pour avoir test\303\251 plusieurs applications de gestion de batterie, j\'ai finalement choisi celle-ci au point m\303\252me d\'en acheter la version payante. Elle est \303\251l\303\251gante, ergonomique et fait tout ce qu\'elle pr\303\251tend faire. Elle n\'est toutefois pas exempte de bugs mineurs - 5 \303\251toiles d\303\250s qu\'ils sont corrig\303\251s - mais dans l\'ensemble, je la recommanderais sans h\303\251sitation. Merci aux auteurs. Continuez, s\'il vous pla\303\256t, \303\240 am\303\251liorer cette appli !  Having tested several battery management apps, I chose this one and bought the full version. It\'s beautiful, handy and most of the time does what it says it does. It is not free from minor bugs - 5 stars as soon as these bugs have been corrected - but I would highly recommend it. Thanks to the authors. Please keep improving this great app!
reviews.author: Jean COADOUR

reviews.title: Superb app, But transaction duplicated.
reviews.comment: Hi,   I purchased the pro version initially through the link given inside the free version but the system returned an error and it never changed to the pro version.   Since I badly wanted the app, I again purchased the pro version through the play store.   But the problem is that the transaction went through both times.   Overall the app is 5stars...but would be great if you do something on the above.
reviews.author: Lakshitha Abeywickrama

reviews.comment: Most essential technique has been incorporated to enhance battery life. it really works.
reviews.author: Mukesh Savla

reviews.title: Best battery optomizer!
reviews.comment: No need more comment. This is simply the best app to save more battery energy. Ever.
reviews.author: Muhammad Nur Tanja Putra

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Must have for android. Helps to optimize the battery ussage
reviews.author: Anis Abbas

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: This is one of the best apps ever.
reviews.author: Ernesto Castoza

reviews.title: Very useful and easy to operate.
reviews.comment: Just purchased the app. I liked how the app monitors the battery of my device and how easy it is easy to operate. It gives you control on how you utilize the battery of your device.
reviews.author: Angelo Luis Tancinco

reviews.title: This program is excellent.
reviews.comment: Finally found a great power management application. My thanks to the developers.
reviews.author: Michael Wood

reviews.title: It\'s not as good as it looks at first.
reviews.comment: After some use I realized the time saving estimates are off. Also after you close (clean) apps that are running - they simply start to run again. So you still need to use an App Killer - and set it to ignore the apps you don\'t need.  But the biggest disappointment is when I realized this app doesn\'t offer the \'SleepMode\' feature like some other battery saver apps that are free. You can\'t set the phone to \'sleep\' after certain time of inactivity - and stop all radio functions.   Please, make it better!
reviews.author: Z. Yordanov

reviews.title: Good App...but...
reviews.comment: I haven\'t installed other app related to this one...but it looks ok. One thing though that if you decide to buy the full version, make sure to uninstall first the free version before buying because what happened to me was it did not uninstall the free version; 2 apps running at the same time. Good thing I uninstalled the free version.
reviews.author: Jim Baluyut

reviews.title: A question
reviews.comment: Blue color gives it a professional look. However will highly appreciate if you introduce more lively color. I have seen many vibrant colors other applications use. Hope to see some color change. Thank you
reviews.author: Paresh Shroff

reviews.title: Liked the free one so much had to buy
reviews.comment: This is the best battery app by far. I have tried loads, none ate half as good as this one. It really does work.
reviews.author: Daren Pegg

reviews.title: Best battery saver ever
reviews.comment: Its really good app love it it it I don\'t to charge my tablet every day my tab is an Acer iconia a500
reviews.author: Damien Gascoigne

reviews.title: Samsung s2 plus
reviews.comment: Why my phone is easy out of battery life. I expect more. Need help here.
reviews.author: Abdullah Hadji Daud
